name: makerjs
description: Maker.js, a Microsoft Garage project, is a JavaScript library for creating and sharing modular line drawings for CNC and laser cutters.

scripts.precompile-typescript: ls src/core/*.ts > build.txt && ls src/models/*.ts >> build.txt
scripts.cat-tsd: sed '/\/\/\/.*reference path=.*/ d' target/ts/makerjs.d.ts > target/ts/temp && cat target/ts/tsd-header.txt target/ts/temp > target/ts/makerjs.d.ts && rm target/ts/temp
scripts.target-node-platform: cd target && sed '/\/\/\/.*reference path=.*/ d' ts/makerjs.js > js/node.maker.js && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run compile-typescript && npm run cat-tsd && npm run target-node-platform && npm run target-browser-platform && cp target/js/node.maker.js ./index.js && npm run compile-playground
